teaser: Tomorrow, the President will announce that several major corporations have signed a pledge not to discriminate against the unemployed in hiring decisions.  There are practical and psychological reasons that may work against the long- term unemployed: So what are the counter-arguments for hiring them? Plus, on news of New York teachers coming out against the Common Core, we take a look at the controversial curriculum standards, and what happens next. Finally, lots of tech startups aspire to get bought out by a larger company. If you dream of a bid by Google, what must you offer? Hint: A genius-founder never hurts.
byline: Noel King, Amy Scott, Tommy Andres, Mark Garrison, Steve Gardner, Kai Ryssdal and Maya Escobar
title: Marketplace for Monday, January 27, 2014
